name: Sky Skirmish
description:
POSSIBLE BUG: When playing in the browser the music sometimes only does one loop, this does not happen in the downloaded version, thank you for playing!

In this arcade style platformer, you destroy mini aliens in order to get ammo to take down UFOs! With 3 stages to play, the game will rise in difficulty! Everything from gameplay to sound to graphics to code to animation was made in 72 hours for the Lost Cartridge Jam!

RECCOMENDATION: It is less glitchy if you download and play from the zip file, please keep in mind that you press Q to quit! Thank you for playing!
